tagline: FuseFS to manage Kindle Collection Data

name: Kindlefs
body:
KindleFS is a FuseFS that mounts a Kindles data via Rindle and allows
the management of the kindles collection information via filesystem tools.

## Installation

Add this line to your application's Gemfile:

    gem 'kindlefs'

And then execute:

    $ bundle

Or install it yourself as:

    $ gem install kindlefs

## Usage

Just mount the kindle into some folder.

    $ kindlefs /path/to/kindle/root /path/to/mountpoint

After you are done, unmount the kindlefs via `CTRL-C` and unmount the kindle.
Then do a hard-reset, holding the power-slider for about 20 seconds.
